gui.graphical-qol.config.description.dis:
Disables/Enables Overworld Fog.
In combination with Sodium, if enabled, causes the rendering of all chunks inside the max server render distance (essentially turns off fog culling). As a result, this may impact performance. This cannot be changed
gui.graphical-qol.config.description.gam: Corrects the default Gamma value with a given percentage
gui.graphical-qol.config.description.dis:
Disable the darkening caused by the Blindness effect.
This may be bannable on Servers

Disable the darkening caused by the Darkness effect.
This may be bannable on Servers
gui.graphical-qol.config.description.par:
Multiplies the amount of particles summoned by the given amount.
This heavily affects performance if set too high!
gui.graphical-qol.config.description.no_: Disables/Enables the Head Tilt when  you receive damage
Disables/Enables the Blur Mask when you war a Pumpkin
gui.graphical-qol.config.description.low: Shifts the Fire Overlay up/down when burning by the given amount
gui.graphical-qol.config.description.wea: Adjust the opacity for Weather Particles like Snow and Rain
gui.graphical-qol.config.description.col:
Adjust a global Color Tint of the game.
This can be used to e.g. make the colors less bright, or cooler/warmer
